name: The Void (itch) (BorderDestroyerGames)
description:
Note: Not only is this the first game that I have ever created, but it is also the first Game Jam I've ever participated in, specifically Ludum Dare 48, so it's more than likely not going to be the greatest. That being said I still ask that you be as critical as possible so that in the future I may be able to make something that actually plays well. I hope you enjoy none the less!

Description:

The world has slowly been taken over by the void, with the only way of stopping it is for one organism to plunge deeper into it, sealing it for good. The problem of the matter is that the world has become distorted, to the point where certain aspects can not be seen by the naked eye. You alone poses the ability to alternate between these perspectives, making you the only one able to seal the void for good.

Controls:

WASD to Move

SPACE to Jump

E to Change View
